mapper.select: select username, password, irum, email, joinday, birthday, login_failure_cnt loginFailureCnt, write_cnt writeCnt, levels as "level", enabled, profile, check_code checkCode from users where username=#{username} and rownum=1

select username, password, irum, email, joinday, birthday, login_failure_cnt loginFailureCnt, write_cnt writeCnt, levels as "level", enabled, profile, check_code checkCode from users where email=#{email} and rownum=1

select username, password, irum, email, joinday, birthday, login_failure_cnt loginFailureCnt, write_cnt writeCnt, levels as "level", enabled, profile, check_code checkCode from users where check_code=#{checkCode} and rownum=1
mapper.insert: insert into users (username, password, irum, email, joinday, birthday, login_failure_cnt, write_cnt, levels, enabled, profile, check_code) values(#{username}, #{password}, #{irum}, #{email}, #{joinday}, #{birthday}, #{loginFailureCnt}, #{writeCnt}, #{level}, #{enabled}, #{profile}, #{checkCode})
mapper.delete: delete from users where username=#{username} and rownum=1
delete from users where check_code is not null
